author: Paul Cullen
title: Equipment from China will allow for rapid testing service for virus
description: Extra equipment means Ireland is not reliant on a single supply system – Dr Paul O’Brien
content:
Testing equipment newly sourced from China will allow for hundreds of thousands of people to be tested for Covid-19 as well as increasing turnaround times.
The equipment was secured through a collaboration between individual Irish doctors and agencies in Ire… [+2455 chars]
